animes.title: Bad Monkey
animes.artist: Vince Vaughn, L. Scott Caldwell, Rob Delaney, Meredith Hagner
animes.description: A detective turned restaurant inspector in Southern Florida is pulled into a world of greed and corruption after a tourist finds a severed arm while fishing. And yes, there's a monkey.

animes.title: The Umbrella Academy
animes.artist: Aidan Gallagher, Elliot Page, Tom Hopper, Emmy Raver-Lampman
animes.description: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.
animes.genre: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure

animes.title: Industry
animes.artist: Myha'la, Marisa Abela, Harry Lawtey, David Jonsson
animes.description: Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse.

animes.title: Continuum
animes.artist: Rachel Nichols, Erik Knudsen, Victor Webster, Stephen Lobo
animes.description: The series centers on the conflict between a group of rebels from the year 2077 who time-travel to Vancouver, BC, in 2012, and a police officer who accidentally accompanies them. In spite of being many years early, the rebel group decides to continue its violent campaign to stop corporations of the future from replacing governments, while the police officer endeavours to stop them without revealing to anyone that she and the rebels are from the future.
animes.genre: Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Drama, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: Twisters
animes.artist: Daisy Edgar-Jones, Glen Powell, Anthony Ramos, Brandon Perea
animes.author: Lee Isaac Chung
animes.description: As storm season intensifies, the paths of former storm chaser Kate Carter and reckless social-media superstar Tyler Owens collide when terrifying phenomena never seen before are unleashed. The pair and their competing teams find themselves squarely in the paths of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma in the fight of their lives.

animes.title: From
animes.artist: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey, Hannah Cheramy
animes.description: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normality and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

animes.title: The Bear
animes.artist: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri, Lionel Boyce
animes.description: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

animes.title: Presumed Innocent
animes.artist: Jake Gyllenhaal, Ruth Negga, Bill Camp, O-T Fagbenle
animes.description: A horrific murder upends the Chicago Prosecuting Attorney's' office when one of its own is suspected of the crime.

animes.title: Batman: Caped Crusader
animes.artist: Hamish Linklater
animes.description: Welcome to Gotham City, where the corrupt outnumber the good, criminals run rampant and law-abiding citizens live in a constant state of fear. Forged in the fire of tragedy, wealthy socialite Bruce Wayne becomes something both more and less than human—the Batman. His one-man crusade for justice attracts unexpected allies within the GCPD and City Hall, but his heroic actions spawn deadly, unforeseen ramifications.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Kids & Family, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Animation, Crime

animes.title: Mr. Robot
animes.artist: Rami Malek, Christian Slater, Carly Chaikin
animes.description: A contemporary and culturally resonant drama about a young programmer, Elliot, who suffers from a debilitating anti-social disorder and decides that he can only connect to people by hacking them. He wields his skills as a weapon to protect the people that he cares about. Elliot will find himself in the intersection between a cybersecurity firm he works for and the underworld organizations that are recruiting him to bring down corporate America.

animes.title: SEAL Team
animes.artist: David Boreanaz, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley, Toni Trucks
animes.description: The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan, and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.

animes.title: Evil
animes.artist: Katja Herbers, Mike Colter, Aasif Mandvi, Michael Emerson
animes.description: A skeptical psychologist joins a Catholic priest-in-training to investigate the church's backlog of unexplained mysteries, miracles, and demonic possessions.

animes.title: Fallout
animes.artist: Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Moisés Arias, Walton Goggins
animes.description: In a future, post-apocalyptic Los Angeles brought about by nuclear decimation, citizens must live in underground bunkers to protect themselves from radiation, mutants and bandits.
animes.genre: Drama, Science-Fiction, War & Military, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: The Drew Carey Show
animes.artist: Drew Carey, Ryan Stiles, Diedrich Bader, Cynthia Watros
animes.description: Drew is an assistant director of personnel in a Cleveland department store and he has been stuck there for ten years. Other than fighting with co-worker Mimi, his hobbies include drinking beer and not being able to get dates. To make a few extra bucks he has a micro-brewery going in his garage with his buddies.

animes.title: The Mallorca Files
animes.artist: Elen Rhys, Julian Looman, María Fernández Ache, Tábata Cerezo
animes.description: A British and German detective clashing over how to police the Spanish island of Mallorca.

animes.title: The Instigators
animes.artist: Matt Damon, Casey Affleck, Hong Chau, Michael Stuhlbarg
animes.author: Doug Liman
animes.description: Rory and Cobby are unlikely partners thrown together for a heist. But when it goes awry, they team up to outrun police, backward bureaucrats, and a vengeful crime boss.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: The Bikeriders
animes.artist: Jodie Comer, Austin Butler, Tom Hardy, Michael Shannon
animes.author: Jeff Nichols
animes.description: After a chance encounter, headstrong Kathy is drawn to Benny, member of Midwestern motorcycle club the Vandals. As the club transforms into a dangerous underworld of violence, Benny must choose between Kathy and his loyalty to the club.

animes.title: Emily in Paris
animes.artist: Lily Collins, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu, Ashley Park, Lucas Bravo
animes.description: When ambitious Chicago marketing exec Emily unexpectedly lands her dream job in Paris, she embraces a new life as she juggles work, friends and romance.

animes.title: Killjoys
animes.artist: Hannah John-Kamen, Aaron Ashmore, Luke Macfarlane, Rob Stewart
animes.description: An action-packed adventure series following a fun-loving, hard living trio of interplanetary bounty hunters (a.k.a. Killjoys) sworn to remain impartial as they chase deadly warrants around the Quad, a system of planets on the brink of revolution.

animes.title: Alien
animes.artist: Tom Skerritt, Sigourney Weaver, Veronica Cartwright, Harry Dean Stanton
animes.author: Ridley Scott
animes.description: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.

animes.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
animes.artist: Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth, Tom Burke, Alyla Browne
animes.author: George Miller
animes.description: As the world fell, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great Biker Horde led by the Warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two Tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

animes.title: American Murder: Laci Peterson
animes.description: The case of Laci Peterson's disappearance and murder shook the US in 2002. Her husband Scott was convicted, though he maintains innocence. Twenty years later, Laci's mother and friends speak out, revisiting this tragedy.

animes.title: Snowpiercer
animes.artist: Daveed Diggs, Mickey Sumner, Alison Wright, Iddo Goldberg
animes.description: More than seven years after the world has become a frozen wasteland, the remnants of humanity inhabit a gigantic, perpetually-moving train that circles the globe as class warfare, social injustice and the politics of survival play out.
animes.genre: Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Action & Adventure, Drama

animes.title: Shōgun
animes.artist: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai, Tadanobu Asano
animes.description: In Japan in the year 1600, at the dawn of a century-defining civil war, Lord Yoshii Toranaga is fighting for his life as his enemies on the Council of Regents unite against him, when a mysterious European ship is found marooned in a nearby fishing village.

animes.title: Time Bandits
animes.artist: Lisa Kudrow, Kal-El Tuck, Tadhg Murphy, Roger Jean Nsengiyumva
animes.description: An unlikely alliance forms between a band of thieves and Kevin, an 11-year-old history buff, as they embark on a perilous mission to save Kevin's family and the world.

animes.title: Jackpot!
animes.artist: Awkwafina, John Cena, Simu Liu, Ayden Mayeri
animes.author: Paul Feig
animes.description: In the near future, a 'Grand Lottery' has been newly established in California - the catch: kill the winner before sundown to legally claim their multi-billion dollar jackpot.

animes.title: The Boys
animes.artist: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr, Erin Moriarty
animes.description: A group of vigilantes known informally as “The Boys” set out to take down corrupt superheroes with no more than blue-collar grit and a willingness to fight dirty.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Crime, Drama, Comedy

animes.title: Yellowstone
animes.artist: Kevin Costner, Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly, Wes Bentley
animes.description: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

animes.title: The Old Man
animes.artist: Jeff Bridges
animes.description: Dan Chase absconded from the CIA decades ago and now lives off the grid. When an assassin arrives and tries to take Chase out, the old operative learns that to ensure his future he now must reconcile his past.

animes.title: Mad Men
animes.artist: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones
animes.description: Set in 1960-1970 New York, this sexy, stylized and provocative drama follows the lives of the ruthlessly competitive men and women of Madison Avenue advertising.

animes.title: The Fall Guy
animes.artist: Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Hannah Waddingham
animes.author: David Leitch
animes.description: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.

animes.title: Resident Alien
animes.artist: Alan Tudyk, Sara Tomko, Corey Reynolds, Alice Wetterlund
animes.description: Crash-landed alien Harry takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor. Arriving with a secret mission, he starts off living a simple life…but things get a bit rocky when he’s roped into solving a local murder and realizes he needs to assimilate into his new world. As he does, he begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his mission and asking the big life questions like: “Are human beings worth saving?” and “Why do they fold their pizza before eating it?”

animes.title: It Ends with Us
animes.artist: Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Brandon Sklenar, Jenny Slate
animes.author: Justin Baldoni
animes.description: Adapted from the Colleen Hoover novel, Lily overcomes a traumatic childhood to embark on a new life. A chance meeting with a neurosurgeon sparks a connection but Lily begins to see sides of him that remind her of her parents' relationship.

animes.title: Fire Country
animes.artist: Max Thieriot, Kevin Alejandro, Jordan Calloway, Stephanie Arcila
animes.description: Seeking redemption and a shortened prison sentence, young convict Bode Donovan joins a firefighting program that returns him to his small Northern California hometown, where he and other inmates work alongside elite firefighters to extinguish massive blazes across the region.

animes.title: Young Sheldon
animes.artist: Iain Armitage, Zoe Perry, Lance Barber, Montana Jordan
animes.description: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

animes.title: House of the Dragon
animes.artist: Matt Smith, Emma D'Arcy, Olivia Cooke
animes.description: The Targaryen dynasty is at the absolute apex of its power, with more than 15 dragons under their yoke. Most empires crumble from such heights. In the case of the Targaryens, their slow fall begins when King Viserys breaks with a century of tradition by naming his daughter Rhaenyra heir to the Iron Throne. But when Viserys later fathers a son, the court is shocked when Rhaenyra retains her status as his heir, and seeds of division sow friction across the realm.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Drama, Fantasy, Romance

animes.title: Alone
animes.artist: Dub Paetz, Sarah Poynter, William Larkham Jr., Timber Cleghorn
animes.description: Hardcore survivalists are put by themselves in the Vancouver Island wilderness, without camera crews, teams, or producers – on a single mission to stay alive for as long as possible.

animes.title: 3 Body Problem
animes.artist: Jovan Adepo, Rosalind Chao, Liam Cunningham, Eiza González
animes.description: Across continents and decades, five brilliant friends make earth-shattering discoveries as the laws of science unravel and an existential threat emerges.

animes.title: The Serpent Queen
animes.artist: Samantha Morton, Amrita Acharia, Barry Atsma, Enzo Cilenti
animes.description: Considered an immigrant, common and plain, Catherine de Medici is married into the 16th century French court as an orphaned teenager expected to bring a fortune in dowry and produce many heirs, only to discover that her husband is in love with an older woman, her dowry is unpaid and she’s unable to concieve. Yet, only with her intelligence and determination, she manages to keep her marriage alive and masters the bloodsport that is the monarchy better than anyone else, ruling France for 50 years.

animes.title: Civil War
animes.artist: Kirsten Dunst, Wagner Moura, Cailee Spaeny, Stephen McKinley Henderson
animes.author: Alex Garland
animes.description: A journey across a dystopian future America, following a team of military-embedded journalists as they race against time to reach DC before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

animes.title: The World
animes.artist: Zhao Tao, Cheng Taishen, Jue Jing, 蒋中炜
animes.author: Jia Zhangke
animes.description: At Beijing World Park, a bizarre cross-pollination of Las Vegas and Epcot Center where visitors can interact with famous international monuments without ever leaving the city’s suburbs, a security guard betrays his dancer girlfriend by pursuing another woman.

animes.title: World War Z
animes.artist: Brad Pitt, Mireille Enos, Daniella Kertesz, James Badge Dale
animes.author: Marc Forster
animes.description: Life for former United Nations investigator Gerry Lane and his family seems content. Suddenly, the world is plagued by a mysterious infection turning whole human populations into rampaging mindless zombies. After barely escaping the chaos, Lane is persuaded to go on a mission to investigate this disease. What follows is a perilous trek around the world where Lane must brave horrific dangers and long odds to find answers before human civilization falls.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Horror, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: World War Two
animes.artist: Indy Neidell
animes.author: Spartacus Olsson
animes.description: Follow the deadliest conflict in human history in real time, week by week, blow by blow.
animes.genre: Documentary, War & Military, History, Made in Europe

animes.title: World Poker Tour
animes.description: Poker players from around the world compete for large cash prizes

animes.title: World Trigger
animes.artist: Nao Tamura, Yuichi Nakamura, Tomo Muranaka, Yûki Kaji
animes.description: A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!

animes.title: World Series of Poker
animes.description: The World Series of Poker is a series of poker tournaments held annually in Las Vegas and, since 2004, sponsored by Caesars Entertainment Corporation. It dates its origins to 1970, when Benny Binion invited seven of the best-known poker players to the Horseshoe Casino for a single tournament, with a set start and stop time, and a winner determined by a secret ballot of the seven players.

animes.title: World War Weird
animes.artist: Sam Willis, Robert Joe
animes.description: Unusual, strange, weird plans, plots that took place, or planned to take place during World War Two.

animes.title: World's Funniest
animes.artist: Terry Crews
animes.description: Home videos of people not quite at their best.

animes.title: World Dice Tour
animes.artist: Pani Bottle, Kwak Joon-bin, Lee Won-ji, Noh Hong-chul
animes.author: Kim Tae-ho, Kim Hoon-beom
animes.description: Three travel content creators competing to win a trip to space embark on the adventure of a lifetime, rolling the dice to decide where they'll go next.

animes.title: World of Dance
animes.artist: Jennifer Lopez, Ne-Yo, Derek Hough, Jenna Dewan
animes.description: Dancers battle in heats of artistry, precision and athleticism in this reality-competition show.
animes.genre: Reality TV, Kids & Family, Music & Musical

animes.title: World of Winx
animes.artist: Carole Baillien, Alice Ley, Esther Aflalo, Mélanie Dermont
animes.description: The Winx travel all over the world searching for talent for WOW. and preventing the mysterious talent thief from kidnapping them.
animes.genre: Animation, Action & Adventure, Kids & Family, Fantasy, Comedy, Made in Europe

animes.title: World War II in HD Colour
animes.artist: Robert Powell, Adolf Hitler, Winston Churchill, Franklin D. Roosevelt
animes.description: World War II In HD Colour is a 13-episode television documentary miniseries recounting the events of World War II narrated by Robert Powell. The show covers the Western Front, Eastern Front, and the Pacific War. It is on syndication in America on the Military Channel. This series is in full color, combining both original and colorized footage.
animes.genre: Reality TV, War & Military, Documentary, History, Made in Europe

animes.title: World's Greatest Dad
animes.artist: Robin Williams, Alexie Gilmore, Daryl Sabara, Evan Martin
animes.author: Bobcat Goldthwait
animes.description: In the wake of a freak accident, Lance suffers the worst tragedy and the greatest opportunity of his life. He is suddenly faced with the possibility of fame, fortune and popularity, if he can only live with the knowledge of how he got there.

animes.title: World's Craziest Fools
animes.artist: Rupert Vansittart, Mr. T
animes.description: World's Craziest Fools is a clip show made by Roughcut TV for BBC Three, presented by Mr. T. It showcases clips, sometimes viral, of people making themselves look like "Fools", often by accident. Many clips were from CCTV footage. The videos were shown in different categories such as "Parking Fools", "Drunk Fools", "Criminal Fools", and "Fools jumping off things they shouldn't be jumping off of". As would be expected, some categories see more entries than others, and the categories that feature episode-to-episode are not bound to a predetermined structure.

animes.title: World of Quest
animes.artist: Ron Pardo, Landon Norris, Kedar Brown, James Rankin
animes.description: World of Quest is a Canadian animated series based on the graphic novel story by Jason Kruse published by Komikwerks.
animes.genre: Animation, Comedy, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Kids & Family, Music & Musical

animes.title: World Trade Center
animes.artist: Nicolas Cage, Michael Peña, Maria Bello, Maggie Gyllenhaal
animes.author: Oliver Stone
animes.description: Two police officers struggle to survive when they become trapped beneath the rubble of the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.

animes.title: WorldEnd: What are you doing at the end of the world? Are you busy? Will you save us?
animes.artist: Ryohei Arai, Azusa Tadokoro, Akari Uehara, Satomi Sato
animes.description: The fleeting and sad story about little girls known as fairy weapons and an associate hero that survived. This is a world after it was attacked by unidentified monsters known as beasts and many of the species in the world, including humans, had been destroyed. The species that had managed to survived left the ground and were living on a floating island called Regal Ele. Willem Kmetsch wakes up above the clouds 500 years later and couldn’t protect the ones who he wanted to protect. Actually, he was living in despair because he was the only survivor.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Drama, Animation, Fantasy, Romance

animes.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman
animes.artist: Aoi Yuki, Ayana Taketatsu, Kaito Ishikawa, Maaya Uchida
animes.description: The scenery takes place in a private high school involving the concept of "saviors." They are known as people who possess awakened memories of their past lives. The story tells of a young boy named Moroha Haimura who comes to this private school. At the school, there are two types of people: Saviors, who fight enemies with weapons and techniques gleaned from the Puraana powers from their own bodies, and Kuroma, who wipe out enemies with magic to manipulate the Maana powers that surpass physics. Moroha Haimura is the first person with past lives of both Shirogane and Kuroma.

animes.title: World Eats Bread
animes.description: Delectable documentary chronicling bread's roots across cultures. Each episode unveils a staple loaf's origins, mirroring homelands' history and identity.

animes.title: World's Most Evil Killers
animes.artist: Geoffrey Wansell, Elizabeth Yardley, Fred Dinenage
animes.description: World’s Most Evil Killers delves into the gripping real-life stories of the world’s most terrifying and prolific killers. From Fred and Rose West to Ed Gein – The Clown Killer – and even to The Milwaukee Cannibal. Each episode focuses on one notorious killer and features authentic first-hand accounts of their behavior, from detectives who ran the case, journalists who reported on the stories, relatives, and at times survivors, alongside series experts who provide analysis. These criminologists, crime journalists and psychologists examine how the infamous killers made headlines both nationally and internationally and why they still continue to evoke fear and fascination in the public eye.

animes.title: The World from Above
animes.artist: Philippe Sollier, Richard Mervyn
animes.description: The World from Above is a unique continuing series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft, down to just a few feet the stabilised high definition aerial camera seeks out the beautiful, as well as the dramatic, on journeys across very different parts of the world including Europe, Africa and the United States.

animes.title: World Conquest Zvezda Plot
animes.artist: Natsuki Hanae, Misaki Kuno, Mariya Ise, Kana Hanazawa
animes.description: Junior High student Jimon Asuta is in a fix. He had a big fight with his dad and was kicked out of the house. With no money and no place to live he shares the last of the food with an unusual little girl he encounters. It turns out she is Venera the Great, the leader of the secret organization Zvezda and committed to conquering the world. At first he thinks it is just a little girl's fantasy, but strange events with weird technology soon prove that Zvezda is, in fact, for real.
animes.genre: Comedy, Science-Fiction, Action & Adventure, Fantasy, Animation

animes.title: World War II: From the Frontlines
animes.artist: John Boyega
animes.description: Through vividly enhanced archival footage and voices from all sides of the conflict, this docuseries brings WWII to life like never before.

animes.title: World's End Harem
animes.artist: Keiko Watanabe, Taichi Ichikawa, Haruka Shiraishi, You Taichi
animes.description: The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years, leaving behind Tachibana Erisa, the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze, he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants, however, is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?
animes.genre: Animation, Drama, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Romance

animes.title: ABC World News Tonight With David Muir
animes.artist: David Muir, Whit Johnson, Linsey Davis
animes.description: ABC World News is the flagship daily evening television news program of ABC News, the news division of the American Broadcasting Company television network in the United States. Currently the weekday editions (going by title ABC World News Tonight with David Muir) are anchored by David Muir. ABC World News has been anchored at various times by a number of other people since its debut in 1953. It also has used various titles, including ABC Evening News from 1970 to 1978 and World News Tonight from 1978 to 2006.

animes.title: World Without End
animes.artist: Oliver Maltman, David Bradley, Ben Chaplin, Charlotte Riley
animes.author: Michael Caton-Jones
animes.description: Two hundred years after the construction of the great cathedral, the medieval town of Kingsbridge is  taken under siege by Queen Isabella. Caris, a visionary young woman, inspires her people to stand up for their rights and revolt against to the most powerful forces of her time, the Church and the Crown.

animes.title: World on Fire
animes.artist: Jonah Hauer-King, Julia Brown, Helen Hunt, Zofia Wichłacz
animes.description: World War II-era drama centered on the lives of ordinary people affected by the war.

animes.title: World's Deadliest
animes.artist: Jeremy Davidson
animes.description: The Animal Kingdom is rife with deadly snakes.

animes.title: The World to Come
animes.artist: Katherine Waterston, Casey Affleck, Vanessa Kirby, Christopher Abbott
animes.author: Mona Fastvold
animes.description: In 1856, two women forge a close connection despite their isolation on the American frontier.

animes.title: World's Funniest Animals
animes.artist: Elizabeth Stanton
animes.description: Host Elizabeth Stanton and a celebrity guest panel look at animals doing the funniest things ever caught on video. The series includes viral internet clips of funny animal moments, hilarious animal clips from major motion pictures and popular TV series, animal outtakes that surprise the whole cast and crew, videos of babies and pets, as well as celebrities and their pets.

animes.title: Jurassic World Dominion
animes.artist: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Laura Dern, Sam Neill
animes.author: Colin Trevorrow
animes.description: Four years after Isla Nublar was destroyed, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators ona planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures.

animes.title: Worlds Apart
animes.artist: J.K. Simmons, Maria Kavoyianni, Andrea Osvárt, Christopher Papakaliatis
animes.author: Christopher Papakaliatis
animes.description: Three separate narratives each following a love story between a foreigner and a Greek. Each story represents a different generation falling in love during a time of socioeconomic turmoil that dominates Southern Europe as a whole, only to connect as a single story in the end.

animes.title: World War 2: The Call of Duty - A Complete Timeline
animes.author: Liam Dale
animes.description: Track the main events of World War II with the help of remarkable archive footage in this extensive 24 episode series, which shines a spotlight on this monumental period of history.

animes.title: World War One
animes.artist: Robert Ryan
animes.description: This historical survey of the First World War was produced and aired by CBS to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the opening of hostilities. The series used footage that was shot during the era of the war. Much of the footage had never been aired on television before.

animes.title: Wayne's World
animes.artist: Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere
animes.author: Penelope Spheeris
animes.description: The adventures of two amiably aimless metal-head friends, Wayne and Garth. From Wayne's basement, the pair broadcast a talk-show called "Wayne's World" on local public access television. The show comes to the attention of a sleazy network executive who wants to produce a big-budget version of "Wayne's World"—and he also wants Wayne's girlfriend, a rock singer named Cassandra. Wayne and Garth have to battle the executive not only to save their show, but also Cassandra.

animes.title: The Real World
animes.description: Each year, seven strangers in their twenties, from different backgrounds and countries, are chosen to come live together in a major city.

animes.title: Jurassic World
animes.artist: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Irrfan Khan, Vincent D'Onofrio
animes.author: Colin Trevorrow
animes.description: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond.

animes.title: MLB World Series
animes.artist: Joe Buck, Jeanne Zelasko, Tim McCarver, Chris Myers

animes.title: World on a Wire
animes.artist: Klaus Löwitsch, Mascha Rabben, Karl-Heinz Vosgerau, Adrian Hoven
animes.description: Cybernetics engineer Fred Stiller uncovers a massive corporate conspiracy involving a virtual reality computer project.

animes.title: The World Wars
animes.artist: Dean Gosdin, Ian Beyts, David Mitchum Brown, C. Conrad Cady
animes.author: John Ealer
animes.description: The story of three decades of war told through the eyes of various men who were its key players: Roosevelt, Hitler, Patton, Mussolini, Churchill, Tojo, DeGaulle and MacArthur. The series examines the two wars as one contiguous timeline starting in 1914 and concluding in 1945 with these unique individuals coming of age in World War I before ultimately calling the shots in World War II.

result.title: Bad Monkey
result.artist: Vince Vaughn, L. Scott Caldwell, Rob Delaney, Meredith Hagner
result.description: A detective turned restaurant inspector in Southern Florida is pulled into a world of greed and corruption after a tourist finds a severed arm while fishing. And yes, there's a monkey.
